description: Equivalent of the Kurepa hypothesis for left factorial.
references: A. Petojevic, M. Zizovic, Trees and the Kurepa hypothesis for left factorial, Filomat (Nis), (1999), 31-40.
links: Romeo Mestrovic, Variations of Kurepa's left factorial hypothesis, arXiv preprint arXiv:1312.7037, 2013
author: Aleksandar Petojevic (apetoje(AT)ptt.yu), Apr 09 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 09 2000
